name: YouTube - Full HD comment visibility
description: For people using high-definition displays and want to read the comments without text resizing or squinting at the display.
additional_info: Created on a 720p display driving a 1080p image. This might be a relatively common setup for people who want to have 1:1 1080p video on the cheap, as I was able to get away with this with some unit preference tinkering. Especially handy for couch-surfing YouTube. This doesn't affect streaming chat however, which is a planned update. Any improvements can be left as comments on this style, so contribute as you wish. Bugs "Read more" appear on comments which are four lines long in their containers, which is an unexpected side effect I discovered after uploading this style. A workaround for this is being researched.
